entry.tran: （旧时的人或物的）当代翻版的，现代的，当今的
entry.def: Latter-day is used to describe someone or something that is a modern equivalent of a person or thing in the past.

example.ex: He holds the belief that he is a latter-day prophet.
example.tran: 他深信自己是当代先知。

auth_sentence.content: The answers to your questions can found in the teachings of the church of Jesus Christ of Latterday Saints.
auth_sentence.res_content: The answers to your questions can found in the teachings of the church of Jesus Christ of Latterday Saints.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The answers to your questions can found in the teachings of the church of Jesus Christ of Latterday Saints.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
